topic_title: Federal Judge Blocks Parts of Trump Grant Funding Freeze
description: This case demonstrates the constitutional principle of separation of powers and the judicial branch's role in checking executive overreach. It shows how federal courts can protect congressional spending authority and highlights the importance of the Impoundment Control Act in preventing presidents from unilaterally withholding appropriated funds.
